raw_comment: The new article gives us a more clear idea of why the southern states receive more leaves and their spring faster than we do. After reading this we realized possibilities that the world offers for a faster spring in southern states, we also learned that places collect phenology data to prove why they contain a faster spring.
ace_sentences: The new article gives us a clearer idea.
The new article explains why the southern states receive more leaves than we do.
The new article explains why spring in the southern states is faster than spring where we live.
After reading the article, we realized some possibilities.
These possibilities can cause a faster spring in the southern states.
We learned that some places collect phenology data.
Phenology data can prove why these places have a faster spring.
